text:
''Important:''

* ATM a browser reload is needed, if this option is used
* The following filter in the [[debug-mode]] tiddler needs to be enabled to use the input

```
\define tv-debug-filter() [subfilter{test-dynamic-filter!!filter}]
```

Define a new subfilter. Start with `[limit[20]]` to activate the subfilter:

<$edit field="filter" tag=input class="tc-edit-texteditor " />
title: test-dynamic-filter
